USER QUERY: Turn on all backyard landscape lights at sunset if any of them are currently off.

__BEGIN_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
{
  "routine": {
    "id": 101,
    "name": "Sunset - turn on backyard landscape lights if any off",
    "parent": 0,
    "comment": "Turns on all landscape lights at sunset if any are off",
    "if": [
      { "at": { "sunset": 0 } },
      { "and": 1 },
      { "(": 1 },
        { "<": { "device": "37 59 8A 1", "status": "ST", "value": 100, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "<": { "device": "71 B A5 1", "status": "ST", "value": 100, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "<": { "device": "2C F7 16 1", "status": "ST", "value": 100, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } },
      { ")": 1 }
    ],
    "then": [
      { "device": "37 59 8A 1", "command": "DON" },
      { "device": "71 B A5 1", "command": "DON" },
      { "device": "2C F7 16 1", "command": "DON" }
    ],
    "else": [],
    "reasoning": "Run at local sunset; if any of the three landscape fixtures reports Off (status ST < 100) turn all to On to ensure consistent lighting."
  }
}
__END_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
